metadata.name: Swimming 1 #1
metadata.description:
The glass window that stays in my eyes is another world of mine created by the time of precious memories and the experiences of those times. Each image creates a spatial illusion, and the image world beyond the window becomes an ecstatic virtual reality of memory given by the time the replica exerts more power than the original.

#NFTart  #sunglasses  #swimming  #physical-based
